Articles.Content: When the 'search for planets' mechanic is introduced, I really hope they re-jiggle the orbits and positions of the planets... Does anyone else feel the same?

Such a feature would need an astronomy update. Meaning telescopes. Youd have to watch the night sky for moving stars so they'd have to make a realistc apparent magnitude. As for the planets there fine as they are. Only reason to tweak the orbits is if they add more bodies.
